metadata.synopsis: A guard in the Moonrise Tower warehouse. Looking forward to the coming war.

0.speaker: Zealot Zira
0.text: I hear we'll be marching west soon. Hope to see you on the front line.
0.context: NodeContext: looking forward to the war that's coming

1.speaker: Zealot Zira
1.text: Don't get too close to the prisoners - they're desperate enough to try anything.
1.context: NodeContext: A light-hearted warning - your thinking of the prisoners the same way somebody might think of a cornered animal
